gurmukhi: bwn brjnI Awid kih irpxI AMq bKwn ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN lIjhu cqur pCwn ]519]
transliteration: Baan Barjaniaadh Kah(i) Rip Ar(i) Ant Bakhn|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Leejoh Chatur Pachhaad||519||
translation: Saying firstly “Baan-Varjani” and uttering the word “Ripuni” at the end, the names of Tupak are formed.519.

gurmukhi: ibisK brKnI Awid kih irp Air pd ky dIn ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN cqur lIjIAhu cIn ]520]
transliteration: Bisikh Barkhaniaadh Kah(i) Rip Ar(i) Pad Ke Deen|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Chatur Leejeeauh Cheen||520||
translation: Saying primarily “Vishikh-varshini” in the beginning and then adding “Ripu Ari”, O wise men ! the names of Tupak are formed.520.

gurmukhi: bwr dwienI Awid kih irp Air pd ky dIn ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN lIjhu smJ pRbIn ]521]
transliteration: Baar Daaeniaadh Kah(i) Rip Ar(i) Ant Ouchaar|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Leejoh Samajh Prabeen||521||
translation: Saying the word “Baar-Daayani” in the beginning and then adding “Ripu Art”, the names of Tupak are formed.521.

gurmukhi: ibisK ibstnI Awid kih irp Air AMq aucwr ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN lIjhu su kib suDwir ]522]
transliteration: Bisikh Bsitaniaadh Kah(i) Rip Ar(i) Ant Ouchaar|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Lijoh Su Kabi Suddaar(i)||522||
translation: Saying firstly the words “Vishikh-Vrashtni” and then uttering “Ripu Ari” at the end, the names of Tupak are formed.522.

gurmukhi: pnj pHwrn Awid kih irp Air AMq aucwir ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN lIjhu su kib ibcwr ]523]
transliteration: Panaj Prahaaran Aadh Kah(i) Rip Ar(i) Ant Oucdaar(i)|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Lijoh Su Kabi Bichaar||523||
translation: Saying the word “Panaj-Prahaaran” in the beginning and then uttering “Ripu Ari” at the end, the names of Tupak are formed.523.

gurmukhi: DnnI Awid aucwrAY irp Air AMq aucwr ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN lIjhu su kib ibcwr ]524]
transliteration: Dharnaniaadh Oucdareeai Rip Ar(i) Ant Ouchaar|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Lijoh Su Kabi Bichaar||524||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Dhanani” and then uttering “Ripu Ari” at the end, the names of tupak are formed.524.

gurmukhi: ipQRm DnKnI Sbd irp Air pd ky dIn ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN suGr lIjIAhu cIn ]525]
transliteration: Pritham Dhankhanishabad Kah(i) Rip Ar(i) Pad Ke Deen|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Soughar Lijeeauh Cheen||525||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Dhanukhani” and then adding “Ripu Ari”, the names of Tupak are formed, which O wise men ! You may recognize.525.

gurmukhi: kuAMfin Awid aucwrIAY irp Air pd ky dIn ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN lIjhu smJ pRbIn ]526]
transliteration: Kuandan(i) Aadh Oucdareeai Rip Ar(i) Pad Ke Deen|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Leejoh Samajh Prabeen||526||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Kuvandni” and then adding “Ripu Ari” the names of Tupak are formed, which O skilful persons ! you may comprehended.526.

gurmukhi: bwxw gRjnI Awid kih irp Air pd kO dyhu ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN cIn cqur icq lyhu ]427]
transliteration: Baanaa Praharniaadh Oucdareeai Rip Ar(i) Pad Kau Deh(u)|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Cheen Chatur Chitt Leh(u)||527||
translation: Saying firstly “Baanaa-Grajni” and then adding “Ripu Art”, O wise persons ! the names of Tupak are formed.527.

gurmukhi: bwx pHrxI Awid kih irp Air pd ky dyhu ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN suGr lIjIAhu cIn ]528]
transliteration: Baan Praharniaadh Oucdareeai Rip Ar(i) Pad Ke Deen|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Soughar Leejeeauh Cheen||528||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Baan-Praharni” and then adding “Ripu Ari”, the names of Tupak are formed.528.

gurmukhi: Awid aucr pd bwxnI irp Air AMq aucwr ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN lIjhu su kib ibcwr ]529]
transliteration: Aadh Ouchar Pad Baananirip Ar(i) Ant Ouchaar|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Lijoh Su Kabi Bichaar||529||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Baanani” and then adding “Ripu Ari” at the end, the names of Tupak are formed.529.

gurmukhi: ibisK prnnI Awid kih irp pd AMq bKwn ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN cInhu cqur pRmwn ]430]
transliteration: Bisikh Parnaniaadh Kah(i) Rip Pad Ant Bakhaan|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Cheenoh Chatur Pramaan||530||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Bisikkh-Pranani” and then adding “Ripu Ari” at the end, the names of Tupak are formed.530.

gurmukhi: ibisKn Awid bKwin kY irp pd AMq bKwn ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN cInhu cqur Apwr ]531]
transliteration: Bisikhan Aadh Bakhaan(i) Kai Rip Pad Ant Ouchaar|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Cheenoh Chatur Apaar||531||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Bisikkhan” and then adding “Ripu Ari at the end, the names of Tupak are formed.531.

gurmukhi: suBt GwienI Awid kih irp Air AMq aucwr ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN lIjhu cqur suDwr ]532]
transliteration: Soubhat Ghaaeniad(i) Kah(i) Rip Ar(i) Ant Ouchaar|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Lijoh Chatur Sudhaar||532||
translation: Saying the word “Subhat-ghayani” in the beginning and then adding “Ripu Ari”, O wise men ! the names of Tupak are formed correctly.532.
